Promoting a business, yourself, or letting people know of an upcoming event?

What do you get?

The main header such as "one page can say it all." The body, which is what you're reading now. A background which can either be an (appropriate) picture or coloured background. Lastly you can have a customized button with it linking what you want your audience to go to (check out mine).
